'''''Amon Hen'' 141''' is the one-hundred-and-forty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in September [[1996]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Pieces in the Jigsaw''
** By: Gordon Palmer
* The View from the Hill (Editorial)
** By: Richard Fraser Overton
* Contents
* News from the Nerve Centres of the Shire
** By: Malcolm Lindley & Richard Crawshaw
* The TS in the Big Wide World
** By: [[Chris Crawshaw|Chris]] & Richard Crawshaw
* Artwork: ''Boromir's Last Stand''
** By: Nick Basi
* TS's Wedding of the Year
** By: Christine Davidson
* Artwork: ''Long Barrows''
** By: Howard J. Bates
* Definitely not M.e. but Fun all the Same
** By: Christine Davidson
* ''Food and Drink, an Unfinished Tale''
** By: [[Patricia Reynolds|Pat Reynolds]]
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Annie Haward
* Artwork: ''Mallorn''
** By: Howard J. Bates
* Review: ''The Ring Goes South''
** By: Annie Haward, Martin Smith, Mike and Maggie Percival & Mike Towers
* Artwork: ''An Elven Mosaic''
** By: Tom Sherry
* Mathom
** By: Jason Finch
* Entings
** By: Christine Davidson
* Annie's Allsorts
** By: Annie Haward
* Artwork: ''Blacksword''
** By: Gordon Palmer
* The Autobiography of Garbog Hearteater, Part One
** By: Timothy Farr
* Letters to the Editor
* Tolk Folk
* Committee
